name: Aladdin GG
description:
A copycat game from the original Aladdin for the Game Gear!

Run through the level avoiding the barrels and the law! Your mission is jump over the barrels and not let the officer reach to you. If your life reaches zero you lose, pick the apples!

Controls

Use Left/Right arrows for the movement.

Use Space bar to jump.

Use Esc or the p key to pause the game.

Credits

This game was made for the Untitled Game Jam (Feb 2023).

Made by:

Alex "ffall" Loeza 

Art by:

Denis "Sineedr" Rios

More...

This game is enterely made from the scratch, including sprites and the background elements. Except for the menu music and stage music. These are from the original title for the Game Gear.

Apologizes for the grammaticals mistakes since Im non-native english speaker. Gracias!
